Our_Cats.name: Cherry
Our_Cats.desc: Cherry is not just a cat, she's the cherry on top of your purr-fect day, with a sweetness that's impossible to resist.

Our_Cats.name: Cheese
Our_Cats.desc: Cheese is not just a cat, he's a purr-fectly aged block of cheddar with a personality as sharp as his whiskers.

Our_Cats.name: Teddy
Our_Cats.desc: Teddy is the cuddle commander, always ready to snuggle up and melt your heart with his fuzzy wuzziness.

Our_Cats.name: Cinnamon
Our_Cats.desc: Cinnamon is the spice of life, with a dash of mischief and a sprinkle of charm that will leave you feline fine.

Our_Cats.name: Crystal
Our_Cats.desc: Crystal, the feline enchantress, her eyes sparkling like precious gems, casting a spell of charm that's simply irresistible.

Our_Cats.name: Cookie
Our_Cats.desc: Cookie is the treat thief, stealthily swiping snacks when you're not looking and leaving crumbs in his wake.

Our_Cats.name: Gin
Our_Cats.desc: The Houdini of the cafe, you'll never know where he's lurking, but you'll definitely feel his presence when he chooses to emerge from the shadows for treats.

Our_Cats.name: Nala
Our_Cats.desc: Nala, like a true queen, reigns not only over hearts but also over every cat tower in the cafe.

Our_Cats.name: Rocky
Our_Cats.desc: Rocky is the heavyweight champion of cuddles, delivering knockout snuggles with a paw-nding force.

Our_Cats.name: Oliver
Our_Cats.desc: A master of the disapproving side-eye and the dramatic hiss. Consider yourself warned, mere mortals!

Our_Cats.name: Stormy
Our_Cats.desc: Stormy is the tempestuous tabby, with a whirlwind of energy and a thunderous purr that shakes the cafe.

Our_Cats.name: Simba
Our_Cats.desc: Simba is the lion-hearted legend, with a mane of fur fit for a king and a meow that echoes through the savanna (or cafe).

Our_Cats.name: Ollie
Our_Cats.desc: Ollie is a fluffy adventurer, always exploring new nooks and crannies with boundless curiosity, that's infectious to everyone around him.

Our_Cats.name: Tiger
Our_Cats.desc: Tiger is the striped sensation, prowling through the house with the grace and power of his wild ancestors.

Our_Cats.name: Popcorn
Our_Cats.desc: The cat who operates on treats and chin scratches. Brainpower not included (but who needs it when you're this cute?).

Our_Cats.name: Icy
Our_Cats.desc: Icy, the frosty princess, glides through the cafe with an elegance and a majestic gaze commanding attention and adoration.

Our_Cats.name: Star
Our_Cats.desc: Star is a shining star in the cat constellation, with a sparkle in her eye and a twinkle in her whiskers.

Our_Cats.name: Diesel
Our_Cats.desc: Diesel is the engine of excitement, revving up playtime with turbocharged zoomies and high-octane antics.

Our_Cats.name: Sky
Our_Cats.desc: Sky, the intrepid skydiver, leaps through the cafe with fearless feline finesse, chasing adventure with every bound.

Our_Cats.name: Angel
Our_Cats.desc: Angel is the heavenly helper, with a halo of fur and a heart of gold that brings joy to all who meet her.
